name: Sealing of The First God
description:
• The Windows build appears as a 0 byte download due to a glitch on itch.io. The download still works properly
  • A microphone is required to play this game

The reign of the gods have lasted too long; their power has gone too great an their reach has gone too far. 

But you know the secret of their creation. You know the sealing words to return them to nothing they were always meant to be, if you an brave the chaos and destruction their realms breed for long enough to speak them. 

Traverse the worlds of gods, survive their wrath, speak the words. 

The sealing of the gods begin with the last and end with the first. 

  • Controls

WASD to move

Left Click to use Shield

Right Click to open Book

Speak the entirety of the sealing words to beat each level
